glsa.title: PLIB: Buffer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in PLIB might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: PLIB includes sound effects, music, a complete 3D engine, font rendering, a simple Windowing library, a game scripting language, a GUI, networking, 3D math library and a collection of handy utility functions.

description.p: A buffer overflow in PLIB allows user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via vectors involving a long error message, as demonstrated by a crafted acc file for TORCS.

impact.p: Remote attackers could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
